'''Ilari''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

A young elf in change of a band of looters currently picking through the desolate [Gorecci Street](/gorecciStreet/), which he claims to be his turf - and the locals are simply paying their dues, one way or another.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved = [Restoring Order](/restoringOrder/)
|none            = 
|other           = * Has a number of lines of unique introductory banter depending on the Watcher's race.
}}

## =Quests

=
* [Restoring Order](/restoringOrder/): He is the potential "law" in the district.

## Reactivity

When first talking to him:
* As an [island aumaua](/islandAumaua/):
*:''"Come for a little swim on Gorecci Street, aumaua? Out with the other sharks?"''
* As a [coastal aumaua](/coastalAumaua/):
*:''"Cuè? You the invasion force, big man? Deadfire Company send you out ahead?"''
* As a [dwarf](/dwarf/) or [orlan](/orlan/):
*:''"Careful. One bad step out here and you drown, aimico/aimica."''
* As a [meadow human](/meadowHuman/) or [pale elf](/paleElf/):
*:''"To get this lost, aimico/aimica, you must have been trying real hard."''
